## VaultListingParams.beforeRedistribution property

When set to `true`<!-- -->, the retrieved Vaults won't include the liquidation shares received since the last time they were directly modified.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly beforeRedistribution?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

Changes the type of returned Vaults to [VaultWithPendingRedistribution](./lib-base.vaultwithpendingredistribution.md)<!-- -->.
